author: deluckybrick
title: Its like a race in a box!
review:
When I got this set, I put it together and then raced it against the other cars I have.  This set comes already with two cars, so it is good for beginners.  It even has the countdown lights!

The only problem is that occasionally, the cars dont race at even speeds, so it deserves a 8.

author: JVbadger
title: Very, very fun.
review:
I really loved this set. The engines were just so much fun! But it has two problems that drag it down.
1. Spoilers are unstable!
2. They're not really minifigs, just heads on a weird driver piece, and that really bothered me.
But it's playability is great, and I guess the driver thing is a matter of opinion.
But since they stopped making it, I find no point on going on ebay to get it. Save your cash.
